TopicTitle: Twitch Thursday: KSPTV to stream KSP 1.0

Articles.Content: He has killed Valentina again.
Amount of ablator is tweakable

Engineers report doesn't show DV. ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)

> 
> Engineers report doesn't show DV. ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)

How do you know? Until now Das has only used Valentina. Is Valentina an engineer?

For all we know more skilled Kerbals will show more details.
3 launches, 3 45 degree turns at 10km. Grr.
And he blames the excessive wobble on the SAS over-correcting. It's clearly himself who's to blame. He has NO IDEA how to handle the more realistic atmosphere.
not final build

Manley just uploaded a 1.0 preview:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bLtincmjbR8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Heat shield seems to ablate even when not exposed?

- - - Updated - - -

parachute showing overheat bar

> 
> And he blames the excessive wobble on the SAS over-correcting. It's clearly himself who's to blame. He has NO IDEA how to handle the more realistic atmosphere.

Your right, every FAR player knows not to use SAS during launch. Old habits die hard it seems.

>

> 
> no barn

So apparently they lied about bringing the barn back?
I sure didn't see it in career at tier one.
Science lab IVA is AWSOME!

> 
> Your right, every FAR player knows not to use SAS during launch. Old habits die hard it seems.

It is not SAS you should disable, it is a thrust you shouldn't overdone. Liftoff smoothly and straight up and start to really accelerate to full speed as you clear through the most dense lower part of atmosphere, and after you pick some more acceleration, about half the way out of atmosphere start to perform gravity turn (also smoothly and with no rush), also it is better to star go at LKO not lower 100km and at best 150km, as altitude of 150km is the easiest to achieve without making any mistakes. Basicly do not be a rushing buffoon and use a bit of that brain of yours =)
Bill is gone!
So disappointed to see that ugly white line on the horizon.

My god. DasValdez was pretty annoying doing his stream. (The only thing he liked more during his stream was himself.) But this Ronin dude is even worse. If I have to listen to him a minute longer I'm probably going to kill my monitor.
